and mesocarp at five developmental stages has been detected by Real-time quantitative PCR.
function of EgFAD8 has been verified by overexpression in
(INVSc1) with exogenous linoleic acid (18:2). To detect whether it could be induced by

No specific permissions were required for these locations/activities. We
confirmed that the field studies did not involve endangered or protected species.
Oil palmfruits were collected fromthe Coconut Research Institute, Chinese Agricultural
Academy of Tropical Crops, Wenchang, Hainan, China. Fruits at five developmental stages
(30â€“60 days after pollination (DAP), 60â€“100 DAP, 100-12- DAP, 120â€“140 DAP, and 140â€“160
DAP) were immediately frozen in liquid nitrogen and stored at -80ËšC until use. Wild-type
ecotype Columbia was used in this study. Arabidopsis plants were culti-
vated in a growth chamber at 23ËšC with a 16-h photoperiod (16 h of 150 Î¼E m
) and the high copy number shuttle vector pYES2
(Invitrogen, USA) were used for gene function analysis.
Nucleotide and amino acid sequence analyses used the BLAST programand open reading
ment of fatty acid desaturases was performed by ClustalX 2.1 programwith default setting
]. A phylogenetic tree was constructed using the neighbor-joining method in MEGA5 [
-acting regulatory element analysis were carried out on the Plant-
Total RNA frommesocarp was extracted by cetyltrimethylammoniumbromide (CTAB) based
]. First-strand cDNA was synthesized from1 Î¼g of total
RNA using FastQuant RT Kit (Tiangen, Beijing, China) according to manufacturerâ€™s instruc-
tions, and was used for gene cloning and expression analysis. The coding sequence of EgFAD8
was amplified by Phusion High-Fidelity DNA Polymerase (Thermo Fisher Scientific, USA)
using primers EgFAD8-pYES2 F and R with restriction site
). PCR was performed with an initial denaturation at 98 ËšC for 30s, 30 cycles at of 98
ËšC for 10 s, 56 ËšC for 30s, 72 ËšC for 60 s and a final extension step of 72 ËšC for 5 min. The PCR
product was cloned into the pEASY-Blunt vector (Transgen biotech, Beijing, China) and
